column4: Microsoft Your Phone Problem with Mozilla VPN
column5: I have just installed Mozilla VPN on my Windows 10 PC and Android 10 Smart phone and have one annoying problem. I use Microsoft Your Phone on my PC and cannot see my Phone Screen with the VPN turned on - message is 'Connect to the same WiFi'. However i am able to see / use Notifications, Messages, Photos & Calls without problem. Local Network Access is ticked but I can't see any other setting to get round this issues.
